task.title: Creating an animated GIF from video file on imgur.com
task.shortdesc: Imgur.com allows you to upload video URLs directly from YouTube without having to download or convert. You are also able to add text to the GIF.

prereq.p: You will need to have a video file chosen beforehand.

step.cmd: Select the section you want turned into a GIF.
step.info: Refer to the image in Step 5.

step.cmd: You will be able to add text in the transparent box that appears on the video.
Process your GIF by selecting Create GIF.
